TopicTitle: after 120+ posts, it might be late for an intro...

Articles.Content:
well, let me explain, I joined this forum to report a bug or 2.... then I played KSP some more, and decided I would like to suggest more terrain options, but after seeing so many things that happen here, I seem to do this only a tiny bit less than KSP itself..

So far, my contributions to the komunity have been a few videos, and sadly, putting some people down because they're suggestion had already been asked not 2 days earlier by another person... I really need to improve on that aspect..

yesterday I created my first part for my KSP save, a satellite dish which didn't have an animation, didn't work and didn't do anything.. it even came with a broken texture, which I don't know why its like that (i did uv map it)

but other than those things, I really play KSP ordinarily, i've made several small minmus bases, a couple of mun landings, been to moho, couple duna landings, ike, and tylo which was really fun (infuriating), because at that time, I had no clue about its gravity and I had used almost all my fuel getting to the jool system. other than that, most of my time is spent dreaming up designs for playing with a friend when multiplayer comes out, and further attempting to make the ever elusive sepatron-kraken hybrid drive...

well hopefully this will give you guys an idea of who that random person who keeps popping up is.

Nemrav, your are as welcome now as you were when you first posted, and will be just as welcome weeks, years from now, thanks for joining and being a part of this Kommunity, may all your rockets fly straight and your Kerbals find their way home

may all your rockets fly straight and your Kerbals find their way home

that isn't happening anymore :

the inter-planetary stage doesn't have enough fuel for the return journey, the lander used more than half of its fuel landing... last I was in the save, it was using rcs to attempt orbit, maybe a last ditch attempt at docking...
